modName: PC HDMI Rainbow Around Dark Edges Colors Fix
summary: Fix to resolve PC HDMI issues on a LCD when edges are showing multi-colors/rainbows. Mostly seen around objects that are black.
descriptionHtml:
Adjusting the Brightness in the Display Settings of the game should eliminate this too, so try that first.

This is for an ATI/AMD. I\'m sure Nvidia has this setting somewhere.

1. Open Catalyst Control Center
2. Navigate to My Digital Flat-Panels
3. Click on Pixel Format
4. Select RGB 4:4:4 Pixel Format Studio (Limited RGB)
5. Apply and close

Fixed!
author: nexE
